column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Still delicious ramen
column2: however service has declined just a tad. Not expecting amazing service
column3: but consistency is key. As said in my previous yelp....parking will always be an issue. My husband orders the same thing
column4: and he tends to drop me and the rest of the party off at the door so he could find space in an already packed parking garage. Once
column5: we were seated immediately after I told the host he was parking. My last experience
column6: the host was a little short and stated we needed to wait for the entire party (even if I know what to order my husband). That time spent waiting in the small lobby space could have been time spent seated at a table with many cocktails. Instead
column8: (minus alcohol because of the inconsistency in service) and left understanding now they're options for ramen in this large city.
